thread.title: Super Bowl: Luke Bryan Is as Charming as Ever During the National Anthem

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Super Bowl: Luke Bryan Is as Charming as Ever During the National Anthem

organizations.name: national anthem luke bryan sings the national anthem

text:
Luke Bryan Sings the National Anthem at the Super Bowl 2017 Super Bowl: Luke Bryan Is as Charming as Ever During the National Anthem February 5, 2017 
â€” NFL (@NFL) February 5, 2017 
Luke Bryan started the night off on the right note when he performed "The Star-Spangled Banner" at the Super Bowl on Sunday. The country singer kept things casual for the big game as he donned jeans, a maroon shirt, and a black jacket. Not only did he put his own spin on the national anthem, but we also can't get enough of his twang. After his swoon-worthy performance, we are more than ready to watch Lady Gaga completely slay during the halftime show. Related:
